page.title: 12Transport
page.content: Many people have cars to go to work or to shop,but there is a bus service.At present the Southern National Bus Company runs a service between South Petherton and Taunton 3 times a day in each direction.In term time a school bus runs from Box Hill to Ilminster via Barrington and Puckington at 8:15, and returns at 15:35.A private company runs a bus on Friday afternoons which travels via Barrington,Puckington and Stocklinch to Ilminster.On Wednesday a bus travels from South Petherton, Crewkerne,Puckington to Taunton. The nearest railway stations are Crewkerne(to London-Waterloo), or Taunton(to London-Paddington).
